nodes.text: Trae Baratha was a female member of the Karthakk Group. She flew with Goll, a member of the Free Ryloth Movement, and Hera Syndulla to deliver gattis-root extract intended for native Twi'leks on Ryloth. The mission was a success, although their ship was almost captured by Imperial V-wing forces.

During the mission, Baratha insisted on everyone in the Eclipse's crew being referred to by codenames, something which Hera and Eira Tay, the freighter's engineer, thought was rather pointless. Baratha herself was "Clinician" under this system.
